snippet: The vexing issue of donor intent has gained a higher profile in recent years, and institutions like the Brooklyn Museum find themselves facing onerous restrictions placed on major gifts.
abstract: Debate over donor intent heats up as museums and other institutions seek permission from courts to make exceptions to sometimes onerous restrictions that benefactors place on major gifts.
lead_paragraph: The vexing issue of donor intent has gained a higher profile in recent years, and institutions like the Brooklyn Museum find themselves facing onerous restrictions placed on major gifts.

headline.seo: Museums Grapple With Onerous Restrictions on Donations
headline.main: Museums Grapple With the Strings Attached to Gifts
headline.print_headline: Museums Grapple With the Strings Attached to Gifts
